snippet: Fosun International Ltd. will pay $725 million for the 60-story office tower owned by JPMorgan Chase.
abstract: Fosun International of China buys One Chase Manhattan Plaza, 60-story office tower in lower Manhattan, besting several bidders with offer of $725 million; company may be bringing in several Chinese companies as tenants; Chase issues statement that it will continue to maintain strong presence in Lower Manhattan, moving about 4,000 employees to other locations but keeping its large branch office at base of tower.
lead_paragraph: Fosun International Ltd. will pay $725 million for the 60-story office tower owned by JPMorgan Chase.

headline.main: Chinese Company Buys Chase Manhattan Plaza
headline.print_headline: Chinese Company Buys Chase Manhattan Plaza
